data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Approving Q3 FY2025-26 Financial Results
data.news_body: Amagi Media Labs Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 11/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve Q3 FY2025-26 Financial Results

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release
data.news_body: Press Release " Amagi becomes the first cloud- native SaaS company offering end to end solutions in the broadcasting and streaming ecosystem to list on Indian Stock exchanges".

data.caption: Announcement Under Regulation 30- Determination Of Materiality.
data.news_body: As per Regulation 30(5) of SEBI LODR 2015 enclosed the list of KMP authorize to determine the Materiality of event or information.

data.descriptor: Appointment of Company Secretary / Compliance Officer
data.caption: Appointment of Company Secretary and Compliance Officer
data.news_body: Mr. Sridhar Muthukrishnan has been appointed as a Company Secretary as on February 26 2025 and Compliance Officer as on April 17 2025 and he continue to be the compliance officer as per Regulation 6(1) of SEBI LODR.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Amagi Media Labs Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from January 21 2026 the Equity Shares of Amagi Media Labs Ltd (Scrip Code: 544679) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20260120- dated January 20 2026.
